articles.title: UK hot weather forecast: 35C heatwave heads from France to Britain for September scorcher - Daily Express
articles.description: BRITAIN is set to scorch as a blistering hot 35C European plume heads towards the nation, according to the latest long-range maps.

articles.content: Footballs greatest club knockout tournament is about to begin again. Europes biggest sides will tonight discover their path to Champions League glory when the group stage draw takes place at 2am AEST… [+2104 chars]
